error.invalid_number: Invalid number. Enter a value between 1 and {max}.
error.self_token: Cannot connect the current bot's own token.

session.title: Recent Sessions
session.prompt:
Enter a number (1-10) or session UUID.
/clear to start a new session
session.not_found: Session not found. Please check the UUID.
session.cleared_desc: Starting a new conversation without previous context.
session.continue_hint: Send a message to continue this session.

busy: Claude is processing. Use /cancel to stop.
queued: Message queued (#{pos}). Will be processed automatically after current task.
bot_duplicate: Duplicate detected: terminated {count} existing bot process(es) and restarting.
bot_started:
Claude Code Bot started
Send /help to see available commands.

total_tokens.title: Total PC Token Usage
total_tokens.no_data: Unable to fetch data (check if bot is running)
total_tokens.connect_title: Enter the bot token of another PC:
total_tokens.connect_prompt:
Enter the token of the other PC's bot.
(@BotFather ‚Üí select bot ‚Üí API Token)
total_tokens.connect_note: The bot must also be running on that PC to fetch data.

help.title: Claude Code Telegram Bot
help.usage_body:
Send text to chat with Claude.
Attach a photo or file to have it analyzed automatically.
Send a skill command (e.g. /autopilot) to have Claude run that skill.
help.session_body:
The bot maintains conversation context per session.
A session is created automatically on your first message,
and subsequent messages continue in the same session.
Use /session to reconnect to a previous session, or
/clear to start a new session.
help.model_body:
/model opus, /model sonnet, /model haiku
/model default to restore the default
help.commands_body:
/builtin ‚Äî List CLI built-in commands
/skills ‚Äî List OMC skills
/update_bot ‚Äî Auto-update bot
help.examples:
analyze mutation.go
/autopilot build a login feature
/plan refactoring strategy
/code_review prog/rand.go

builtin.title: Built-in Commands (CLI)
builtin.handled_list:
/clear ‚Äî Clear session
  /cost ‚Äî Show cost
  /model ‚Äî Change/show model
  /session ‚Äî Select session
  /status ‚Äî Show status
  /cancel ‚Äî Cancel task
  /pwd ‚Äî Current working directory
  /cd ‚Äî Change directory
  /ls ‚Äî List files
  /settings ‚Äî Bot settings (cost display, status messages, etc.)
  /update_bot ‚Äî Auto-update bot (download latest code from GitHub)
builtin.passed_list:
/compact ‚Äî Compress context
  /context ‚Äî Context usage
  /init ‚Äî Initialize project
  /review ‚Äî Code review
  /security-review ‚Äî Security review
  /pr-comments ‚Äî PR comments
  /release-notes ‚Äî Release notes
  /insights ‚Äî Insights
  /extra-usage ‚Äî Extra usage
builtin.cli_only_list:
/config ‚Äî Change settings
  /permissions ‚Äî Permission settings
  /doctor ‚Äî Diagnostics
  /login, /logout ‚Äî Authentication
  /add-dir ‚Äî Add directory
  /agents ‚Äî Agent settings
